text: No is a 2012 Chilean French Mexican American historical drama movie directed by Pablo Larraín and was based on the unpublished stage play El Plebiscito by Antonio Skármeta. It stars Gael García Bernal, Alfredo Castro, Luis Gnecco, Antonia Zegers, Néstor Cantillana, Jaime Vadell and Diego Muñoz. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2013. ==Other websites== * * Category:2012 drama movies Category:2010s historical movies Category:Chilean movies Category:French drama movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pablo Larraín Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies about elections Category:Movies about advertising
title: No (2012 movie)
